text: Ani madayana yethe jevha panyacya thikani pohacale tevha pahile ki lokanca eka samuha tithe pani pajata ahe ani dona striya eka bajula (apalya janavaranna) rokhuna ubhya asalelya disalya. Vicarale ki tumaci kaya samasya ahe? Tya mhanalya ki joparyanta he gurakhi paratuna jata nahita, amhi toparyanta pani paju sakata nahi ani amace pita phara mhatare aheta
